name: College of Eloquence
source: Mythic Odysseys of Theros / Tasha's Cauldron of Everything
description: Bards of the College of Eloquence master the art of rhetoric, weaving words so powerful that their magic rarely fails and their inspiration never goes to waste.

3.name: Silver Tongue
3.description: When you make a Charisma (Persuasion or Deception) check, you can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

3.name: Unsettling Words
3.description: As a bonus action, you can expend one use of Bardic Inspiration to subtract the inspiration die from a creatureâ€™s next saving throw before the start of your next turn.

6.name: Unfailing Inspiration
6.description: When a creature adds one of your Bardic Inspiration dice to its roll and the roll still fails, the Bardic Inspiration die is not expended.

6.name: Universal Speech
6.description: As a bonus action, you grant creatures the ability to understand you regardless of language for 1 hour.

14.name: Infectious Inspiration
14.description: When a creature succeeds using your Bardic Inspiration die, you can use your reaction to grant Bardic Inspiration to another creature without expending a use.
